# UINavigationItem.LargeTitleDisplayMode.never

**Case**

Never display a large title.

## Declaration

```swift
case never
```

## Constants

- **UINavigationItem.LargeTitleDisplayMode.automatic**: Inherit the display mode from the previous navigation item.
- **UINavigationItem.LargeTitleDisplayMode.always**: Always display a large title.
